0.question:
Consider a bag of marbles with three violet marbles and one teal marble. The bag will be drawn from five times and the sequence of violets (V) and teals (T) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a gift card worth $50 if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) TTTTTT.
(b) VVTVVT.
(c) VVTVVV.

1.question:
Consider a bag with 8 marbles: 5 blue marbles (B) and 3 yellow marbles (Y). The bag will be shaken 15 times and the sequence of blues (B) and yellows (Y) will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive shakes of the bag.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) WTTWT.
(b) WWTWT.
(c) WTWWW.

2.question:
Consider a bag with 5 white marbles and 3 black marbles. The marbles will be drawn from the bag without replacement 12 times, and the sequence of white (W) and black (E) marbles will be recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win a gift card worth $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) WWWWEEEE.
(b) WWWWEEWW.
(c) WEWWEEWE.

3.question:
Consider a deck of cards with five blue cards and three yellow cards. The deck will be shuffled and a card will be drawn 15 times, with the color (B for blue, Y for yellow) of each card recorded. You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $30 if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the card.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) JJJJMJM.
(b) MJMMJMM.
(c) MMJJMMJ.

4.question:
Consider a bag with 8 blue marbles and 3 yellow marbles. The marbles will be drawn from the bag 15 times, with the colors recorded in the sequence of blue (B) and yellow (Y). You are asked to select one sequence, from a set of three, and you will win $40 if the sequence you chose appears on successive draws of the marbles.Which sequence do you prefer to bet?
(a) ADADDDA.
(b) DDDDDDA.
(c) DAAAADD.
